body:
RETURN
SELECT
	  O.DocEntry
	, O.DocStatus
	, O.U_ShpCod
    , P.ItemCode
	, P.Dscription
	, P.U_IMei
	, P.U_WhsCod
	, P.WhsCode
	, P.U_WhsTo
	, P.Quantity
	, P.OpenQty	-- Còn lại
	, P.BaseQty	-- Đã nhập
FROM
    dbo.OPOR O (NOLOCK)
		INNER JOIN dbo.POR1 P (NOLOCK)
			ON O.DocEntry = P.DocEntry
WHERE
	P.ItemCode = '00488198'
	
UPDATE
	P
SET
	P.Dscription = N'MTXT Legion Y530-15ICH/Core i5-8300H/8Gb/1Tb+ 128Gb SSD/GTX 1050 4Gb/15.6FHD/Ubuntu/Đen/81FV00STVN'
FROM
    dbo.OPOR O (NOLOCK)
		INNER JOIN dbo.POR1 P (NOLOCK)
			ON O.DocEntry = P.DocEntry
WHERE
	P.ItemCode = '00488198'

SELECT
	  O.DocEntry
	, O.DocStatus
	, O.U_ShpCod
    , P.ItemCode
	, P.Dscription
	, P.U_IMei
	, P.U_WhsCod
	, P.WhsCode
	, P.U_WhsTo
	, P.Quantity
	, P.OpenQty	-- Còn lại
	, P.BaseQty	-- Đã nhập
FROM
    dbo.OPDN O (NOLOCK)
		INNER JOIN dbo.PDN1 P (NOLOCK)
			ON O.DocEntry = P.DocEntry
WHERE
	P.ItemCode = '00534873'

UPDATE
	P
SET
	P.Dscription = N'MTXT Legion Y530-15ICH/Core i5-8300H/8Gb/1Tb+ 128Gb SSD/GTX 1050 4Gb/15.6FHD/Ubuntu/Đen/81FV00STVN'
FROM
    dbo.OPDN O (NOLOCK)
		INNER JOIN dbo.PDN1 P (NOLOCK)
			ON O.DocEntry = P.DocEntry
WHERE
	P.ItemCode = '00488198'
